value.0: Hullo... urr... you seen my friends?
Alright..what do you want to talk about?
It leads to some place called "Hang me mum" or something. Been there once, it's got lots of sand and it's very warm.
I never saw any deserts there! They only got beans and dry white bread. You like some soup?
You mean... they are ...dead? Can I ask you something?
Do you like a cup of soup? I got plenty?
Whatever happened to Roian von Ludersel, our human hero?
How did Maerellion Strongbow, the Elven archer, meet his doom?
Can you tell me how the dwarf Nalvur Thunderbeard passed away?
Can you tell me how the great mage Incánus the Pink met his end?
Can you tell me how my mate Drerry Rumblebuff the Halfling died?
I can deal with it... tell me!
O gawds... and the rest? Can I ask you for more details?

Yups... we're here with ..urr.. a fellership of the something. Me and my mate Drerry Rumblebuff from Bendir, and that old geezer Incánus, who calls himself the Pink. There's also Nalvur Thunderbeard, he's a dwarf and his friend Maerellion Strongbow, an elf. The leader's called Roian von Ludersel, and he's a human.

Can you have a look for them? They went into that door over there... and I *cough* really can't leave my soup right now. Tell them dinner is ready in 15 minutes?
Let's change the topic for a moment...
What's this portal around the corner?
You mean the fabled and mysterious deserts of Ankhremun?
Blessed be the simpleminded, for they know no sin....
Alright, I will have a cup of soup...
Your friends are dead. I already told you so.
Yes, I found them. Not in a very good shape, I am afraid.
Yes, of course...?
You truly are an idiot, aren't you?
Alright, I will have a cup of soup...
Perhaps I need to have a look for him first...
That isn't a pretty story, I am afraid...
Perhaps I need to have a look for him first...
Well... *cough*
Perhaps I need to have a look for him first...
Urmm... I hope you have a strong stomach   ... sure?
Perhaps I need to have a look for him first...
I really shouldn't tell you that... it's rather gross...
Perhaps I need to have a look for him first...
You don't want to know, my friend...
I don't have a clue, my friend.
He was electrocuted by a strange machine,
A boulder trap crushed him.
He starved to death.
Somebody took his head.
His corpse was nailed to a door.
He fell from a bridge and slammed on the rocks below.
He has been eaten by some monster.
Hello there. Your friends?
I am not going in there! Way too dangerous!
OK, I will have a look for them.
